com.google.api.ads.adwords.lib.client

Class AdWordsSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.api.ads.adwords.lib.client.AdWordsSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OAuth2Compatible, AdsSession

    public class AdWordsSession
extends Object
implements AdsSession, OAuth2Compatible
    A AdWordsSession represents a single session of AdWords use.

    Implementation is not thread-safe.

    Author:
    Adam Rogal

public Long getExpressBusinessId()

      • setExpressBusinessId

        public void setExpressBusinessId(@Nullable
                        Long businessId)
        Sets the AdWords Express business ID used by AdWords Express PromotionService.

        When using PromotionService, either set this value or the express plus page ID, but not both.

      • getExpressPlusPageId

        @Nullable
public String getExpressPlusPageId()
        Gets the Google+ page ID for the Google My Business location used by AdWords Express PromotionService.

      • setExpressPlusPageId

        public void setExpressPlusPageId(String expressPlusPageId)
        Sets the Google+ page ID for the Google My Business location used by AdWords Express PromotionService.

        When using PromotionService, either set this value or the express business ID, but not both.
